sense.name: loaning money
sense.commentary: FINANCE[+event] the commercial activity of providing funds and capital
sense.examples: Many think high finance is only practiced by unethical businessmen. The bank's finance of his house took him six years to pay back.

sense.name: the study of finance
sense.commentary: the branch of economics that studies the management of money and other assets
sense.examples: He is studying finance this year. She is a finance major.

sense.name: managing money
sense.commentary: FINANCE[+event] the management of money and credit and banking and investments
sense.examples: Finance is a difficult job. Her finances are a mess.
